name: Veniko Sky: An RPG using only the RTP (DEMO)
name_original: Veniko Sky: An RPG using only the RTP (DEMO)
description: Some people may wonder why someone would want to use the RTP? The answer is that I wanted to test my own creativity. It's been suprisingly challenging so please enjoy this demo. Part One is fully playable and features multiple paths to take. Note that the northern path is very short so I suggest playing the southern first.
